verbose_text: In particular, the myriocin mediated higher vulnerability to apoptosis in WT cells was associated with increased mRNA levels of sptlc1 to the same extent as HD cells (1.236 +/- 0.1394 vs. 1.311 +/- 0.1294; p = 0.3458, Unpaired t-test; Figure XREF_FIG) and reduced mRNA levels of sptlc2 (1.000 +/- 0.01215 vs. 0.8235 +/- 0.08730; p = 0.0214, Unpaired t-test; Figure XREF_FIG) and cers1 (1.020 +/- 0.2276 vs. 0.7510 +/- 0.1547; p = 0.0280; Unpaired t-test; Figure XREF_FIG).
evidence: levels of sptlc2 (1.000 +/- 0.01215 vs. 0.8235 +/- 0.08730; p = 0.0214, Unpaired t-test; Figure  XREF_FIG ) and cers1
